DOC.brief_summary: 30 obese moderate-to-severe heart failure patient randomize intervention control group 5-10 subject . All receive dietetic advice accord randomization accord European Heart Association . Intervention subject initiate 8 week low energy diet , 800-1000 kcal/d formula diet subsequent four week reintroduction regular food supply 1200 kcal/d substitute two daily meal formula meal replacement . Control subject advise follow Nordic Nutrition Recommendations . Patients monitor blood sampling assess change physical performance .
